summary: Anne and Helen move into a California apartment complex for single only where all the occupants are looking to hook up with Milton Berle as the building manager.
cast: John Saxon|Mary Ann Mobley|Lana Wood|Peter Mark Richman|Ann Elder|Chris Noel|Marty Ingels|Hortense Petra|Charles Robinson|Duke Hobbie|Walter Wanderley Trio|Talya Ferro|Cal Tjader Band|The Lewis & Clarke Expedition|Nitty Gritty Dirt Band|Sunshine Company|Milton Berle|Dick Castle|Norma Foster|Maria Korda|Leslie McRay|Dita Nicole|Angelique Pettyjohn|Cal Tjader|Walter Wanderley|Norman Wells
title: For Singles Only
